About the Company: Modex International Securities Ltd started stock broking business in the year 1989 under the trade name "MODEX INTERNATIONAL". They have huge investor base with ultramodern infrastructure, large network of branches, sub-brokers and franchises in all over India. For Equity and Derivative segments, they are a Corporate Member of National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. and Bombay Stock Exchange of India.They are also a Self Clearing Member for Capital Market and F&O Segments both. For Depository Services the Company is a member of Central Depository Services Ltd. They are located in Delhi.
